name: Antibodyo.me
body:
### Background

This site is dedicated to tools related to the analysis of immunoglobulin sequences and repertoires.

### Current repositories

- [IgSCUEAL](http://github.com/antibodyome/IgSCUEAL) : an extension of SCUEAL for analysing immunoglobulin sequences
- [igh-evaluation](http://github.com/antibodyome/igh-evaluation) : datasets and results for V(D)J assignment of immunoglobulin sequences
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
